messages.title: The Best for Brighton
messages.content: As a Brighton Pavilion resident I want the best for our city. I’ve never stood for election before. But I have spent my life trying to make a difference to people’s lives, for a fairer future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Protect and improve our NHS and the public services we all need.
For much needed affordable housing and for a better deal for private tenants.
To combat low pay and make Brighton and Hove a real Living Wage City.
For dignity, decency, fairness and safety - including better outcomes for all and especially for our young people.
To protect our local and global environment for future generations.

issues.health: Protect and improve our NHS and the public services we all need.

housing.content: For much needed affordable housing and for a better deal for private tenants.

leaflet.personalStatement: I’ve never stood for election before. But I have spent my life trying to make a difference to people’s lives, for a fairer future. People tell me about unfairness and of their hopes for a better future for themselves, their family and friends. I often hear from people who struggle to make ends meet or to feel secure. I want to do something about it. Protest is important but bringing about real change is what’s needed.

endorsements.endorsement: I know that Purna will speak up for ordinary people like me who just want the country and the city run in a fairer way.
